[ --help ] show help message -g [ --genome ] arg genome file -q [ --quality ] arg (=10) min. mapping quality -m [ --mappability ] arg input mappability map -y [ --ploidy ] arg (=2) baseline ploidy -o [ --outfile ] arg (="cnv.bcf") output CNV file -c [ --covfile ] arg (="cov.gz") output coverage file

-x [ --sdrd ] arg (=2) min. SD read-depth shift -t [ --cn-offset ] arg (=0.100000001) min. CN offset -z [ --cnv-size ] arg (=1000) min. CNV size -l [ --svfile ] arg delly SV file for breakpoint refinement -v [ --vcffile ] arg input VCF/BCF file for re-genotyping -u [ --segmentation ] copy-number segmentation

-i [ --window-size ] arg (=10000) window size -j [ --window-offset ] arg (=10000) window offset -b [ --bed-intervals ] arg input BED file -k [ --fraction-window ] arg (=0.25) min. callable window fraction [0,1] -a [ --adaptive-windowing ] use mappable bases for window size

-w [ --scan-window ] arg (=10000) scanning window size -f [ --fraction-unique ] arg (=0.800000012) uniqueness filter for scan windows [0,1] -r [ --scan-regions ] arg scanning regions in BED format -d [ --mad-cutoff ] arg (=3) median + 3 * mad count cutoff -p [ --percentile ] arg (=0.000500000024) excl. extreme GC fraction -n [ --no-window-selection ] no scan window selection
